Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: civilisation lie in many respects with that of the Celtic peoples,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: rather than with the earlier civilisation of the Aegean. But all

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the evidence at our disposal seems to indicate that among the Celtic

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: peoples this type of civilisation belongs to a much later period. There

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: is nothing to show that even at Hallstatt and elsewhere in the Eastern

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Alps the earliest use of iron[639] goes back to the beginning of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: first millennium, and it is extremely doubtful whether these deposits

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: are of Celtic origin[640]. In order to prove that Homeric civilisation

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: came from Central Europe evidence must be adduced showing that the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: chronology usually accepted by archaeologists is mistaken and that a

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: civilisation of the same type prevailed in that region far back in the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: second millennium. Until such evidence is forthcoming it appears more

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: probable that both the civilisation of Central and Western Europe and

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the non-Mycenean elements in Homeric civilisation have radiated from a

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: common centre, the true home of which has not yet been discovered.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: These considerations however must not be allowed to obscure the fact

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: that Prof. Ridgeway's observations have thrown light on a number of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: serious difficulties in early Greek history. In the first place he has

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: rightly insisted upon a recognition of the great differences noticeable

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: between Homeric and Mycenean civilisation--differences which can hardly

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: be accounted for except by some such explanation as that which he has

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: brought forward. It is now admitted by the majority of scholars that

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the Aegean civilisation cannot have originated with the Achaeans; but

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: there is still great difference of opinion as to the nature of its

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: relations with this people. Some hold that the prehistoric civilisation

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of Crete was non-Achaean--and indeed non-Greek--until its fall, and yet

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: believe that Mycenae and the other cities of the mainland were always

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Achaean. Others again hold that the later remains both on the mainland

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: and in Crete are Achaean, while the earlier ones, at all events in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Crete, were non-Achaean. But neither of these theories accounts for

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the differences between Mycenean and Homeric civilisation[641]. Both

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: alike involve the assumption that the latter is a reflection of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: conditions of a later age--an assumption which, as we have seen, can

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: scarcely be reconciled with the evidence of the poems on the use of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: metals and other matters discussed above.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Secondly, Prof. Ridgeway has pointed out the groundlessness of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: prevalent hypothesis that the Achaeans were the first Greek-speaking

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: inhabitants of Greece. He has rightly insisted on the antiquity of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Arcadians and Athenians, together with certain other peoples, Ionians

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: and Cypriotes, who had emigrated from Greece, and at the same time

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: called attention to the fact--which is commonly overlooked--that none

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of these peoples claimed to be of Achaean origin[642]. The Achaean

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: communities of historical times used dialects of the West Greek type,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: as distinct from Ionic or Arcadian as they are from Aeolic, and we

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: have no evidence that they ever spoke a different type of language.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: On this subject however enough has been said above (p. 281 ff.). The

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: name 'Pelasgian,' which Prof. Ridgeway applies to the earlier Greek

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: inhabitants, seems to me to be open to objection; yet the evidence of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Herodotus can be adduced in its favour.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Thirdly, when Prof. Ridgeway holds that the route by which the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Achaeans made their way southwards was through Epeiros he has in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: his favour an argument of considerable weight in the antiquity and

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: importance of the sanctuary at Dodona, which in historical times lay

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: on the extreme edge of the Greek world. But, apart from this, the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: linguistic geography of Greece is unintelligible to me unless dialects

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE

line: On the whole warfare is the state of affairs most commonly involved in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: heroic stories. It is a fact worth noting however that this warfare

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: almost invariably takes the form of hand-to-hand fighting and very

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: frequently that of a series of single combats. The national aspect

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of war is seldom brought into much prominence. With the Teutonic and

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: ff.); and we may perhaps remark that all the other Heroic Ages ended in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Ages the warfare certainly has a religious side; but this aspect is not

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: always so prominent in the poems as one might have expected. We know

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: too from historical sources that Welsh princes often fought in alliance

line: The triumphs for which the heroes of heroic poetry hope and for

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: which they are celebrated in the poems are primarily of a personal

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: character and gained by personal prowess, even in times of national

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: war; and all the stories alike are permeated by the spirit of personal

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: adventure. Sometimes we find this spirit indulged with a reckless

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: disregard of consequences, as when Odysseus seeks out the Cyclops in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: his cave[646], or when the Beg Ljubović visits the white city of Zara.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Not unfrequently of course the object with which such adventures are

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: undertaken is the acquisition of wealth. But wealth itself is desired

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: not so much in order to ensure a life of comfort or even a position

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of influence, but rather for the sake of display--that the hero may

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: be able to outshine all his rivals in splendour. Desire of personal

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: glory--often coupled with love of adventure for its own sake--appears

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: to be the leading motive in all the various types of heroic poetry

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: which we have considered.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Now it has often been remarked that the savage is in many respects like

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: a child. We are certainly not justified in describing the people of any

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of the Heroic Ages treated above as savages; but it would be an equally

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: great error to regard their civilisation, even in the best case,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: as mature. And in this respect I cannot help thinking that modern

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: historians have tended to fall into a mistake similar to that which has

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: sometimes been made by European governors of savage or semi-civilised

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: communities. It is a mistake for which our historical authorities

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: themselves are doubtless partly responsible; for we need not suppose

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: that Greeks or Romans of the past, whether scholars or statesmen,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: were better able to understand the motives of heroic societies than

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: are similar persons in our own days. The qualities exhibited by these

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: societies, virtues and defects alike, are clearly those of adolescence.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Further, we may note in this connection that the evidence of history

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: gives us no ground for supposing that the 'heroic' spirit is an innate

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: and permanent characteristic of certain peoples. It may be possible to

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: point to communities in which the Heroic Age has persisted for many

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: centuries, just as numerous peoples in different parts of the world

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: have remained in a state of 'infancy' or savagery down to the present

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: time. In Europe however the Heroic Age has been a transient phase.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: The sequel has sometimes been disastrous, sometimes comparatively

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: prosperous; but in every case the ideas which animated the Heroic Age

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: have ceased to retain their hold.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Thus far we have been seeking to find characteristics common to

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: various Heroic Ages. It will be convenient here to refer briefly to

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the conclusions at which we arrived in the last three chapters. We saw

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: (p. 365) that in regard to social organisation the outstanding feature

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: both of the Teutonic and Greek Heroic Ages was the weakening of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: ties of kindred and the growth of the bond of allegiance. In political

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: organisation (p. 390 f.) the chief feature of both periods was the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: development of an irresponsible type of kingship resting upon military

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: prestige, the formation of kingdoms with no national basis and the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: growth of relations between one kingdom and another. In religion (p.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: 425) the predominant characteristic in both cases was the subordination

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of chthonic and tribal cults to the worship of a number of universally

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: recognised and highly anthropomorphic deities, together with the belief

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: in a common and distant land of souls. Lastly, we observed (in Note

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: VIII) that the Gaulish Heroic Age appears to have possessed almost all

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the same characteristics, while in regard to social and political

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: organisation analogies are also to be found in the Heroic Ages of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Cumbrian Welsh and the Christian Servians, though hardly--or only to a

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: very slight extent--in that of the Mohammedan Servians.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Now it deserves to be remarked that these characteristics are in no

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: sense primitive. In social organisation the distinguishing feature

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of the Heroic Age is in the nature of a revolt or emancipation from

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: those tribal obligations and ideas by which the society of primitive

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: peoples is everywhere governed. The same remark applies in principle to

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: political organisation; the princes of the Heroic Age appear to have

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: freed themselves to a large extent from any public control on the part

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of the tribe or community. The changes which we have noted in religion

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: have a similar tendency. Tribal ideas give way to universalism both

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: in the cult of higher powers and in the conception of immortality;

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: and in both the Teutonic and Greek Heroic Ages these changes seem

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: to be associated with a weakening in the force of religion. Briefly

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: expressed, the characteristic feature of both periods is emancipation,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: social, political and religious, from the bonds of tribal law.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: It will be seen that the emancipation of which we are speaking is

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: partly of an intellectual character. This applies both to religion and

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: to those ideas which govern social relations. On the other hand it is

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: also partly in the nature of a freedom from outside control, both in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: social relations and in government. The force formerly exercised by

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the kindred is now largely transferred to the comitatus, a body of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: chosen adherents pledged to personal loyalty to their chief. So also in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: government the council of the tribe or community has come to be nothing

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: more than a comitatus or court. The result of the change is that the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: man who possesses a comitatus becomes largely free from the control

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of his kindred, while the chief similarly becomes free from control

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: within his community. In both cases the only opposition that he now has

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: to fear is from rivals who desire to take his place or from persons

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: outside the kindred or community and in a similar position to himself.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Certainly this freedom applies only to the case of kings or princes

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: with followings of their own. But there is no reason for supposing that

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: intellectual emancipation made much headway except among such persons

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: and their entourages.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: We have seen above that the characteristics of Heroic Ages in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: general are those neither of infancy nor of maturity--that the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: typical man of the Heroic Age is to be compared rather with a youth.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: The characteristics which we are now discussing are by no means

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: inconsistent with such a view, though clearly they will not hold good

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: for adolescence in general. For a true analogy we must turn to the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: case of a youth who has outgrown both the ideas and the control of his

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: parents--such a case as may be found among the sons of unsophisticated

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: parents, who through outside influence, at school or elsewhere, have

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: acquired knowledge which places them in a position of superiority to

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: their surroundings.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: If we examine the history of the Teutonic Heroic Age we shall see that

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: this analogy holds good both for individual princes and for the class

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: as a whole. From the first century to the fifth--we may take the cases

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of Italicus the son of Flavus and of Theodric the Ostrogoth--it was

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: customary for the Romans to demand the youthful sons of Teutonic kings

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: as hostages. That the accession of such persons to power in later life

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: would open up a channel for the introduction of foreign ideas needs

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: probably no demonstration. But this was doubtless only one of a number

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of such channels. There is scarcely a single considerable deposit of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: antiquities dating from the first four centuries, not only in the south

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: and west of Germany but even in Denmark and other Baltic lands, which

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: does not contain a large proportion of Roman[647] articles. Among such

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: articles we may mention coins, works of art (glass vases, statuettes,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: etc.) and, perhaps above all, armour and weapons. We may refer in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: particular to the Roman helmets and the large number of Roman swords

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: and shield-bosses found in deposits on the east side of the province

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of Slesvig--a district remote from the Roman frontiers. The linguistic

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: evidence too is in full agreement with that of the antiquities. Of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the immense number of Latin loan-words which found their way into the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Teutonic languages it is probable that quite a considerable proportion

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: were borrowed in or before the Heroic Age.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Among the various channels through which Roman goods and Roman

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: influence found entry into the Teutonic world we may mention trade,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: presents and subsidies, and booty gained by wars and piratical raids.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: But the most potent influence of all perhaps was the Roman practice

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of employing Teutonic mercenary soldiers--of which we hear both from

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: inscriptions and literary works. This practice had begun as early as

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the first century, and it is noteworthy that those German princes who

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: gave the Romans most trouble, such as Arminius and Civilis, were men

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: who had previously served with their own armies. In the early part

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of the Heroic Age it appears that a very considerable proportion not

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: only of the troops but also of the generals in the imperial service

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: were of Teutonic nationality. Such forces were contributed largely by

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: communities which had settled within the boundaries of the empire,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: such as the Goths and Vandals in the basin of the Danube and those

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: smaller communities that we hear of incidentally in the east of Gaul.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: But it was by no means only from these dependent or semi-dependent

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: principalities that the auxiliary troops were drawn. In the reigns

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of Constantius and Valentinian I the Roman army in Britain contained

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: troops of Heruli--a nation which probably occupied the basin of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Elbe and had never been under Roman sovereignty, although a portion of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: it submitted to Justinian long afterwards. We have reason for believing

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: that in the sixth century persons from the farthest parts of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Teutonic world were fighting in Italy. Otherwise it is difficult to

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: account for the knowledge of Norway and Sweden shown by both Jordanes

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: and Procopius.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: It would be a mistake no doubt to suppose that the comitatus owes its

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: origin to this mercenary service. The evidence for its existence goes

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: back so far that a Gaulish derivation would be more probable, if it is

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: not of native origin. But there can scarcely be any question that this

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: form of service tended to promote its development. Here too we find a

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: satisfactory explanation of other phenomena noticeable in the Heroic

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Age, in particular of that military type of kingship which rests on no

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: national basis. Further, it needs no demonstration that such service

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: would contribute very largely to sweep away tribal prejudices and

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: national patriotism.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: On the whole then the conclusion to which we are brought is that the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: characteristics of the Heroic Age owe their origin not so much to

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the national movements which brought about the destruction of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Western Empire as to the long-standing relations between the two

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: peoples, and perhaps more especially to the influence exercised by

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: mercenary service. Now we obtain a more satisfactory explanation of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the effects produced on the more northern peoples. It is by no means

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: improbable that warriors even from Denmark fought in the Roman armies,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: while others again may have entered the service of Eormenric, Attila

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: or Theodric. At all events we can hardly doubt that, directly or

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: indirectly, the northern peoples were affected to no small degree by

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the influence of Roman civilisation and the Roman army.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: I do not suppose that anyone will be inclined to question the influence

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of the same civilisation upon the Welsh Heroic Age. The greater part

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of Britain had been under the Romans for more than three centuries,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: though some considerable time elapsed between their retirement and

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the beginning of the Heroic Age. But it is to be noted that the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: characters who figure in heroic poetry belong partly to the west but

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: chiefly to the north, i.e. to those parts of the country which had

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: been less Romanised than the rest. Moreover Welsh tradition traced

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the ancestry of the most important western families to a certain

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Cunedda who, according to a statement in the Historia Brittonum which

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: most historians seem disposed to accept, had come from a region in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the north beyond the Wall about--or very shortly before--the time

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: when the Romans evacuated Britain. The chief northern families also

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: belonged, at least mainly, to districts which appear to have been

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: abandoned by the Romans early in the third century, and which had

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: probably never been effectively occupied. Dumbarton, their principal

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: stronghold, lay far from the frontier of the later province--indeed

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: on the extreme edge of the earlier frontier. All the evidence at our

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: disposal therefore indicates that the Heroic Age was not a product of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the Romanised part of Britain but of those communities which remained

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: more or less independent, more especially in the region beyond the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: northern frontier. At the same time it cannot be denied that even these

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: districts must have been greatly affected by Roman influence--probably

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: in much the same way and to at least the same degree as the Teutonic

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: peoples adjacent to the Roman frontiers on the Continent. There is

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: little doubt too that the inhabitants of these districts served as

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: mercenary soldiers[648]. The conditions then appear to have been very

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: similar to those of the Teutonic Heroic Age. First we find Roman

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: influence, doubtless both civil and military, affecting the communities

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: beyond the frontier. Then, on the fall of the Roman power, these

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: communities, or rather their princes, step in and take possession of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: part of the province. The chief difference between the two cases is

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: that here the new rulers were of the same nationality and spoke the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: same language as the previous inhabitants.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: The origin of the earlier Servian Heroic Age presents in some

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: respects rather an interesting parallel to the case we have just

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: been considering. Like the northern Britons the Servians occupied

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: territories which had formerly been within the frontiers of the Roman

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Empire. Their possession of these territories was recognised by the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: emperor Heraclius (610-640) not long after their settlement; and from

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: this time onwards they were governed by a number of petty princes of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: their own in a state of semi-dependence, often merely nominal, on the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Greek Empire for about six centuries. During the whole of this period,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: except perhaps for a few short intervals, when they were subject to the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Bulgarians, they were constantly exposed to the influence of Greek

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: civilisation. It is probable too that they were frequently employed in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: war by the Greek emperors, first against the Avars and later against

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the Magyars. On the death of Manuel I (1180), when the Empire rapidly

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: went to ruin, Stefan Nemanja united the various principalities and

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: formed a powerful Servian state. His work was continued and extended

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: by several of his successors, especially by Uroš I (1242-1276) and

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Dušan (1331-1356), the latter of whom brought nearly the whole of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the Balkan peninsula under his rule. Here again therefore, as in the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Teutonic and Cumbrian Heroic Ages, we have the case of a semi-civilised

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: and 'juvenile' nation exposed for a long period to the influence of a

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: civilised but decaying empire. Again too, when the older power gives

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: way, the younger nation asserts itself and takes possession of its

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: neighbour's territories. In this respect however the affinities of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Servian state are rather with the kingdoms of the Ostrogoths in Italy

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: or the Franks in Gaul than with the Cumbrian Welsh; for the latter

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: apparently never succeeded in establishing a united state--at least not

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: until their territories had been greatly diminished.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: The history of the later Servian (Bosnian) Heroic Age was of a very

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: different kind. After the Turkish conquest (1459 in Servia proper,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: somewhat later in the west) a large proportion of the inhabitants

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: embraced Islam. From this time onwards their condition was somewhat

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: comparable with that of their ancestors under the Greeks, though they

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: were in much closer subjection to the suzerain power than the latter

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: had ever been. Moreover, though they enjoyed a certain amount of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: prosperity during the sixteenth and seventeenth centuries when the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Turkish empire was at the height of its power, they never again formed

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: an independent state. There can be no question that during the whole of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: this period the Mohammedan Servians were exposed to foreign influence,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: probably to a greater extent than any of the cases with which we have

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: dealt above. But this influence was of a very different character from

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the others and little calculated to produce emancipation, whether

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: intellectual or otherwise. In estimating the value of the resemblances

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: which their heroic poetry shows to the types discussed above account

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: must be taken of the consideration that much has doubtless been

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: inherited--not merely in metre and phraseology--from that of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: earlier period.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: In dealing with the Gauls we are placed at a disadvantage through not

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: knowing when the Heroic Age began. But all that we do know of their

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: early history bears a most striking resemblance to the Heroic Age of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the Teutonic peoples. Our first trustworthy references to the Gauls

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: (Κελτοί) go back to the fifth century, at which time they appear to

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: have occupied France and some parts at least of western Germany. It is

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: commonly held also that they had already penetrated into Spain; and

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: there can be no doubt that by this time a considerable part of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: British Isles was in the possession of Celtic peoples. By the beginning

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of the fourth century, if not earlier, they had effected settlements

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: in the plain of northern Italy, from whence military expeditions

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: frequently made their way far into the peninsula. In the latter part of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the same century we hear of Gauls in the Eastern Alps, probably in the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: basin of the Danube. Early in the following century Gaulish armies were

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: making expeditions throughout the greater part of the Balkan peninsula

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: and even into Greece, while one force effected a settlement in Asia

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Minor.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: There is no evidence that any civilised power had acquired even a

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: nominal authority over the Gauls before their subjugation by the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Romans. But it is quite clear that for many centuries they had felt

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the influence of the Etruscan and Greek civilisations, more especially

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the former. Linguistic evidence is not available here, since we know

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: nothing of the Etruscan language and little of the Gaulish. But the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: fact is placed beyond doubt by the large variety of articles of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Etruscan origin or Etruscan types, which have been found throughout

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the territories of the Gauls and even in more northern regions. The

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: evidence seems to indicate that the influence of this civilisation was

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: comparable with that exercised in later times by Roman civilisation

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: on the Teutonic peoples. Unfortunately however we have no historical

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: record of those movements which first brought the Gauls into southern

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Europe. All that can be said with certainty is that in the earliest

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: times for which we have trustworthy evidence they appear usually as

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: auxiliaries or mercenaries in the service of the Etruscans. Sometimes

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: also they were employed by the Greeks, Carthaginians and Samnites.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: And it was not only the Gauls settled in Italy who were used in this

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: way. Occasionally we hear also of Transalpine Gauls or 'Gaisatoi,'

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: who came to their assistance. Polybius (II 22) states that the latter

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: name means 'mercenaries' (διὰ τὸ μισθοῦ στρατεύειν); and even if

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: his interpretation is incorrect, it is significant enough of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: opinion generally entertained as to the character of these warriors.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Evidence to the same effect is afforded by the consideration that in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the fourth and third centuries at least half of Europe (exclusive of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Russia) appears to have been under Celtic rule, while some five or six

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: centuries later Celtic nationality had vanished almost everywhere. Such

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: phenomena are scarcely explicable unless the Celtic conquests were

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: largely in the nature of military occupations, like those of the Goths,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Visigoths and Vandals in later times.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: We have left the Greek Heroic Age until the end because in this case

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: historical information is wanting. Here also it is clear that a high

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: civilisation had existed in a portion of the area then occupied by

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the Achaeans; and there can be no doubt that the latter were deeply

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: affected thereby. The difficulty lies in determining the relationship

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of the Achaeans to this civilisation. Prof. Ridgeway's theory on the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: question has already been discussed. At the same time however it was

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: mentioned that there are other scholars who hold that the Achaeans

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: themselves were partly responsible for this civilisation. Some believe

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: that the prehistoric civilisation of Crete was non-Achaean until

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: its fall, and yet claim an Achaean origin for the fortresses on the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: mainland (Mycenae, Tiryns, etc.)[649], while others attribute to the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Achaeans not only the buildings on the mainland but also the later

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: palaces in Crete[650]. It is recognised by the advocates of this latter

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: view that a different type of civilisation appears in other--more

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: western--districts which have at least as good a claim to be regarded

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: as Achaean lands. The explanation given is that the more primitive

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: pottery and less elaborate buildings of these districts are true

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: products of Achaean art and handicraft, while the remains found at

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Mycenae and elsewhere are due to native, or rather Cretan, craftsmen

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: and builders, who worked for Achaean lords.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Both these explanations are open, as we have seen, to the serious

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: objection that they fail to account for the differences between Homeric

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: and Mycenean (Late Minoan) civilisation. It has been observed that in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: regard to armature the affinities of the former lie apparently rather

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: with the Warrior Vase (cf. p. 185), which belongs to a later period

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: than the true Mycenean age. All indications favour the view that this

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: type of armature is derived from that of the Shardina rather than

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: from earlier Mycenean or Cretan types. Again, I do not see that the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: presence of vases of 'Late Minoan II' style in the tombs found at

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Kakovatos--which is identified with the Homeric Pylos--can fairly be

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: held to prove that these tombs date from that period[651]; for, when

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the manufacture of such vases had ceased they may very well have been

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: preserved as precious heirlooms for a considerable time. Nor can it be

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: said with certainty that these tombs date from the Achaean period[652],

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: or at all events from the last days of it[653]. The evidence of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: pottery[654] found in the ruins of the citadel seems rather to suggest

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: that this site was inhabited at a later date than the tombs[655].

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: In the Homeric poems we certainly find the Achaeans in possession of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the chief centres of the prehistoric civilisation both in Crete and on

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the mainland. Mycenae itself is represented as the principal seat of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the most important of the Achaean dynasties. But the poems themselves

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: do not tell us by whom these places had been founded--though the origin

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of Troy does seem to be known. If we are right in believing that only

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the stratum represented by the Warrior Vase and the Stele corresponds

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: truly to the conditions depicted in the poems, it is a probable

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: inference that the Achaeans came into possession of Mycenae at a very

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: late period in its history. In that case the presence of Agamemnon in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: this city would be a phenomenon somewhat parallel to that of Theodric

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: (Dietrich von Bern) in Ravenna. In later times, it is true, we meet

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: with stories according to which Tiryns and Mycenae were founded by

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Proitos and Perseus, though it is not made clear whether these persons

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: were regarded as Achaeans. But have we any reason for believing that

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: such stories are more trustworthy than the medieval traditions which

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: attribute the foundation of famous Roman buildings to Dietrich von

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Bern? In view of the parallel cases, both Teutonic and other, which we

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: have discussed in earlier chapters, it seems to me a highly improbable

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: hypothesis that the men of the Greek Heroic Age had long been in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: possession of an advanced civilisation--still more that they had

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: themselves initiated the construction of great palace-fortresses such

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: as those of Tiryns and Mycenae.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: The problem which we are considering has been complicated by the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: prevalent assumption that the Achaeans were the first Greek-speaking

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: inhabitants of the land--an assumption which seems to me to be

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: incompatible with the evidence of linguistic geography. The objections

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: noted above to the Achaean origin of Mycenean civilisation would not

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: apply with the same force to the hypothesis that this civilisation had

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: been taken over from an earlier branch of the Greek race, represented

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: perhaps in later times by the Arcadians and Ionians. For such an

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: explanation a certain parallel might be found in the occupation of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: (Roman) cities in Britain by British chiefs from the north and west

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: (cf. p. 446 f.). But in this case, if we wish to press the analogy,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: we must bear in mind that the civilisation of the British cities was

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: not of native origin but superimposed on the country by invaders from

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: overseas. It is by no means impossible that such may have been the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: case also in Greece. Yet on the whole the complete break between the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: prehistoric civilisation and that of historical times must be regarded

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: as an argument--not conclusive of course but weighty--against any

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: form of the theory that the possessors of the former were of Greek

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: nationality.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: It may be convenient now to recapitulate briefly the various points

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: at issue. In the first place account must be taken of the undoubted

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: existence of the prehistoric civilisation, regarding the character of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: which evidence is still gradually accumulating. Further, it is scarcely

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: open to question that the Achaeans were brought into contact with

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: that civilisation in some form or other, though almost all scholars

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: are agreed that it did not originate with them. The chief questions

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: which remain to be settled are (i) whether the civilisation was

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: native or introduced from abroad (Crete or elsewhere), (ii) whether

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: its possessors were Greeks or non-Greeks, (iii) whether its monuments

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: were constructed under Achaean domination or before the centres of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: civilisation fell into Achaean hands. The first of these questions can

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: only be settled by a thorough examination of the various sites, such

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: as is now being conducted[656]. All that can be said as yet is that

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the buildings in several cases show work belonging to more than one

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: period. It is now believed that the earlier parts of the fortresses

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: at Tiryns and Mycenae go back at least to the beginning of 'Late

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Minoan' times, i.e. probably to the sixteenth century. On the second

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: question something has been said above. But until further evidence is

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: forthcoming a dogmatic expression of opinion would be out of place.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: With regard to the third it appears to me that such evidence as we

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: have favours Prof. Ridgeway's view, viz. that the Achaeans came into

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: contact with this civilisation only at its fall. In that case moreover

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the Greek Heroic Age will fall into line with all the other Heroic Ages

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: which we have discussed above.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Lastly, it seems to me of essential importance that the relationship

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of the Achaeans to the 'sea-peoples,' more especially the Shardina,

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: should not be overlooked. We cannot with certainty determine whether

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: or not the Achaeans were actually descended from the Shardina. But the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: resemblance between the two in regard to armature scarcely leaves room

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: for doubt that the one had at least come greatly under the influence

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of the other. Consequently, whatever may be thought as to the proposed

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: identification of the Akaiuasha (cf. p. 188 f.), it is highly probable

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: that the ancestors of the Achaeans had once been associated with the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: 'sea-peoples[657].'

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: We have seen that among the Teutonic peoples, as also among the Gauls

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: and elsewhere, mercenary service was a factor of supreme importance

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: in the development of those features which give to the Heroic Age

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: its distinctive character. Now it is as mercenary soldiers that the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: 'sea-peoples' come before our notice from the time when they are first

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: mentioned down to their disappearance. We know from the Tell-el-Amarna

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: tablets that Shardina had entered the Egyptian service in the reign

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of Amenhotep IV or his predecessor, i.e. in the first half of the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: fourteenth century. Later we find them fighting under both Rameses

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: II and Rameses III. The references therefore extend over a period of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: nearly two centuries. Nor was it only to the Egyptians that they lent

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: their services. The army of the Hittites encountered by Rameses II at

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: Kadesh is said to have contained Shardina, and warriors of the same

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: stock were present in the Libyan army defeated by Merenptah.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: With the Shardina we usually find a number of other peoples

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: associated[658]; and there is no reason for doubting that these were

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: employed in the same way. Reference may be made to the description

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of the allies of the Hittites in the Poem of Pentaur, where this is

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: expressed quite clearly[659]. The Pulesatha also represented on the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: monuments of Rameses III are evidently well-disciplined professional

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: soldiers.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: There can be no question then that professional military service, very

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: frequently in the employment of foreign nations, was the vocation of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: those bands of warriors whom we have to regard as the predecessors

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of the Achaeans of the Heroic Age. But we can scarcely suppose that

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: this mercenary service first began in regions so distant as Egypt. It

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: has been mentioned above that the earliest reference to Shardina in

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the Egyptian service goes back to a time when the Cretan palaces were

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: probably still standing (cf. p. 184). If so and if, as is commonly

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: believed, the absence of fortifications in Crete was due to the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: possession of a thalassocracy by its rulers, we must conclude that

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: these rulers permitted the early expeditions of the 'sea-peoples.'

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: That can scarcely mean anything else than that the Shardina and their

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: confederates were first employed as mercenaries by the Cretans

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: themselves[660]. In that case the relations of these peoples with the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: civilised states of the Aegean were in all probability very similar to

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: those of the Teutonic peoples with Rome before and after the fall of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the Western Empire.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: The ultimate origin of the Shardina and their confederates is

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: a question which as yet can hardly be regarded as ripe for

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: discussion[661]. Later discoveries may show that they were the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: inhabitants of the western or northern parts of Greece; or on the other

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: hand they may confirm the view that these peoples had come in part from

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the western Mediterranean. All that can be said at present is that some

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: of these peoples--the Pulesatha type--appear to have long been settled

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: in the Aegean area[662] and that the resemblances and differences

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: between these and the Shardina are of such a kind as to suggest that

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the two were peoples racially distinct[663], yet living in adjacent

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: regions and following a similar mode of life, at least so far as the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: military element is concerned. On the whole the balance of probability

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: seems at present to be in favour of the following propositions: (1)

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: that the Shardina element was intrusive; (2) that its true home is

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: to be looked for rather in the north than in the west[664]; (3) that

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: its presence or influence in the Greek world is not unconnected with

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: that series of national movements which introduced Thraco-Phrygian

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: populations into Asia Minor[665].

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: It is by no means impossible that the Shardina were the direct

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: ancestors of the Achaeans. On the other hand they may have belonged

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: to an earlier wave of Greek invasion. Or again they may have been

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: a non-Greek (perhaps Thraco-Phrygian) people whose relations with

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the Achaeans were rather in the nature of influence, however deeply

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: this may have penetrated. That the Achaeans also were an essentially

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: military people is shown by the tone of Homeric poetry throughout and

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: by the story of the Iliad as a whole, as well as by many incidental

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: passages in the Odyssey. We have good reason too for believing that

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: their occupation was in the nature of a military rather than a tribal

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: settlement. That is shown not only by the social and political

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: conditions reflected in the Homeric poems[666] but also by the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: fact that, except in two comparatively unimportant districts, they

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: disappeared after the Heroic Age as completely as the Ostrogoths.

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: The course of our investigations has led us to conclude that there is

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: no reason for regarding the Greek Heroic Age as an exception to the

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: general rule applying to such phenomena. Neither here nor in any other

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: case are we justified in believing that the Heroic Age was a native

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: outgrowth from an ancient and highly developed civilisation. It does

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: not appear that a Heroic Age can arise from such conditions, any more

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: than from conditions which may properly be called primitive. In four of

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: the six cases which we have considered--and we need scarcely hesitate

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: to reckon the Greek case as a fifth--the Heroic Age can be traced

Poem Title: THE CAUSES AND ANTECEDENT CONDITIONS OF THE HEROIC AGE
line: back to a similar series of causes. Firstly, we find a long period
